body_html:
One thing that seems strange to me is the part of the error that says:

c:\anaconda2\conda-bld\pytorch_1519501749874\work\torch\lib\th\generic/THTensor.c:24

because anaconda2 shouldn't be involved here at all. It should be running from anaconda3. Does this indicate that there was a problem with the installation of PyOpenNMT?
body_text:

body:
One thing that seems strange to me is the part of the error that says:
> c:\anaconda2\conda-bld\pytorch_1519501749874\work\torch\lib\th\generic/THTensor.c:24

because anaconda2 shouldn't be involved here at all. It should be running from anaconda3. Does this indicate that there was a problem with the installation of PyOpenNMT?
